definition: topic/problem for discussion/exam question/subject/to inscribe/to mention/CL:個|个[ge4],道[dao4]

sentences.english: IP has become an important subject in fields of diplomacy and foreign trade.
sentences.chinese: 知识产权已经成为外交外贸领域的重要议题。

sentences.english: We have disputed about this issue many times.
sentences.chinese: 我们已经针对这个议题吵过好多次了。

sentences.english: Daria:What topics do you vote about?
sentences.chinese: 你们投票的议题是哪些啊？

sentences.english: I think the practice of cat meat consumption should also be on CNN's next agenda.
sentences.chinese: 我想对猫肉消费实践应该是CNN的下一个议题。

sentences.english: Indian and Russian officials say the two prime ministers held wide-ranging discussions.
sentences.chinese: 印度和俄罗斯官员说，两国总理就议题了磋商。

sentences.english: Our meeting has an open-ended agenda.
sentences.chinese: 我们的会议不设定任何固定的议题。

sentences.english: Phytosanitary, which shows the characteristics of both public goods and technical rampart, is a significant part of Negotiation on Agricultural Multilateral Trade.
sentences.chinese: 动植物检疫是农业多边贸易谈判的重要议题之一。

sentences.english: Supervisory issues and supervisory strategies may affect supervisee 's session impact.
sentences.chinese: 督导议题与督导策略可能影响受督者之晤谈感受。

sentences.english: On this issue they thought as one.
sentences.chinese: 在这个议题上他们的想法一致。

sentences.english: The decline in breastfeeding has become a major concern to health workers.
sentences.chinese: 母乳哺喂率下降之关注议题已经考量到职场员工。

sentences.english: And a big theme for European far-right parties is Muslim-bashing.
sentences.chinese: 并且欧洲极右政党的一个重大议题便是痛击穆斯林。

sentences.english: Web information security has become one of the most serious topics on Internet.
sentences.chinese: 网络信息安全已成为互联网发展的最重要议题之一。

sentences.english: His remarks are not relevant to our discussion.
sentences.chinese: 他的话不切我们的议题。

sentences.english: Kristof began testing what topics would be censored.
sentences.chinese: 克里斯托夫开始测试哪些议题将被屏蔽。

sentences.english: A related issue involves the power of governmental authorities to search media offices.
sentences.chinese: 一个相关的议题涉及政府当局搜查媒体办公室的权力。

sentences.english: It might. Gay-marriage is one of the hot-button social issues of our time.
sentences.chinese: 同性婚姻是当今社会的热门议题。

definition: proposal/draft resolution/motion (to be debated)/to propose a bill/to make a proposal
consultative conference (political venue during early communist rule)/consultative meeting/deliberative assembly
